item.description:
Hello everyone,

I'd like to wish you all a happy and prosperous 2010. I hope that everyone had a restful and enjoyable holiday season, and that you have plenty of energy to make things happen this year.

Our January meetup will be next Thursday, January 21 at 8PM at the Cambridge Brewing Company at Kendall Square.

If your New Year resolutions include making your start-up finally happen, hiring some great talent, joining a exciting company, promoting your venture, or just meeting fellow entrepreneurs, come join us. We'll be drinking beer and wine, socializing, and talking about techie things.

I'll be sending a reminder next Wednesday and letting you know how to find us (although that's never a problem).

Cheers,
Sergio
item.how_to_find_us: We are usually toward the front on the right.
item.name: January WebSquared Meetup
